channel.title: How make so after a quest the npc gives you a item
channel.description: How can you do that? Because after the quest, the player gives the items he want. Then, the quest completes and then you receive a Santahat.

item.title: How make so after a quest the npc gives you a item
item.dc:creator: @anelm anelm
item.description:
@anelm wrote:

try something like this

if(Engine.playerItems.HasItemAmount(p, #, 1) == true) { Engine.playerItems.deleteItem(p, #, Engine.playerItems.getItemSlot(p, #), 1); p.frames.showChatboxInterface(p, 241); p.frames.animateInterfaceId(p, 9760, 241, 2); p.frames.setNPCId(p, npcid, 241, 2); p.frames.setString(p, "quest giver", 241, 3); p.frames.setString(p, "ah thank you for those logs!.", 241, 4); Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, #, 1); } else if(Engine.playerItems.HasItemAmount(p, #, 1) == false) p.frames.animateInterfaceId(p, 9760, 241, 2); p.frames.setNPCId(p, npcid, 241, 2); p.frames.setString(p, "quest giver", 241, 3); p.frames.setString(p, "come back when you have the items.", 241, 4); break; } }

I just made this up so it might not work but try a code like that. Where i have the # put the item id’s, and put your npcid where it says (npcid)

Read full topic
